alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:24PM MDT until August 03 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... South central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 423 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manila Village, or 21 miles east of Denver, moving southeast at 15 mph. A second severe thunderstorm was located south of Bennett, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, Bennett, Watkins, Strasburg and Manila Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
